text: Maria Koterbska (13 July 1924 – 18 January 2021) was a Polish singer. She was popular in the 1950s and 1960s. She was born in Bielsko, Poland. In 1999, Koterbska was awarded the Officer's Cross of the Order of Polonia Restituta.Informacja o odznaczeniu w Monitorze Polskim (na INFOR.pl) Koterbska was known for her singles were "Augustowskie noce", "Brzydula i rudzielec", "Karuzela", "Parasolki", "Serduszko puka w rytmie cza cza", "Wrocławska piosenka" and "Do grającej szafy grosik wrzuć". Koterbska died in Bielsko- Biała, Poland on 18 January 2021 at the age of 96.Zmarła Maria Koterbska, legenda polskiej piosenki ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish singers
title: Maria Koterbska
